channel.title: DEADMAN | 25x XP | Happy New Years | Aegis
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[url=http://aegisps.net]http://aegisps.net[/url] :)
Please bear with us as we clean up bugs any bugs. The reasons I changed this server to a deadman server is because I WANT TO PLAY. So I will make sure to fix the bugs that are most annoying in an order I would want them fixed as a player. If you want to play just check us out.
Things are changing and my goal is to implement things that MAKE SENSE. If you want a Deadman server YOUR WAY, join here![/COLOR]
[SPOILER=QUICK FEATURES][COLOR=#2da6ff][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#2da6ff]*100 XP PER HIT - Combat *25x Skills (Potions / food / rune amour taken out of shops to make skilling profitable) *Safety Deposit Box *No guards, but frozen once you step into a safe zone skulled *No bank keys, but best 10 items are automatically sent to your bank *ALL THE OLD FEATURES OF AEGIS *20 minutes skulls *Safe zones at Draynor, Varrock West Bank, Ardougne Bank and Lumbridge Castle *Save 2 Combat Stats + HP *Save 3 Skills *Targeting System [/COLOR][/B][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media][img]http://i.imgur.com/Z4qeDlD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bvzoO3U.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3ymc2J9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/twoSSpQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QTeTsio.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sJ4r93f.png[/img] [COLOR=#2da6ff][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#2da6ff] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6oXiKTU.png[/img] [/COLOR][/B][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=More Media][COLOR=#2da6ff][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#2da6ff][img]http://i.imgur.com/cjHynUl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/e2WN8hL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/M8GiUEM.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9ErKbpQ.png[/img][/COLOR][/B][/SPOILER] [/CENTER]

[CENTER]

http://aegisps.net

Please bear with us as we clean up bugs any bugs. The reasons I changed this server to a deadman server is because I WANT TO PLAY. So I will make sure to fix the bugs that are most annoying in an order I would want them fixed as a player. If you want to play just check us out.

Things are changing and my goal is to implement things that MAKE SENSE. If you want a Deadman server YOUR WAY, join here![/COLOR]
